original_text: And he did what was evil in the sight of the Lord, according to all that his father had done.
korean_text: 여호야긴이 그의 아버지의 모든 행위를 따라서 여호와께서 보시기에 악을 행하였더라

sentences.original_text: And he did what was evil in the sight of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 주님 보시기에 악한 일을 행했습니다

sentences.original_text: according to all that his father had done.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아버지가 행했던 모든 것과 같이
